title: The Unexpected Adventures of Ling Moore
summary: Ling Moore, a 78-year-old retired superhero, rediscovers her powers through the act of kindness and caring, ultimately saving her community from a hidden danger.
summaryGerman: Ling Moore, eine 78-jährige pensionierte Superheldin, entdeckt ihre Kräfte durch die Tat der Freundlichkeit und Fürsorge neu und rettet letztendlich ihre Gemeinschaft vor einer verborgenen Gefahr.
summaryDutch: Ling Moore, een 78-jarige gepensioneerde superheld, herontdekt haar krachten door de daad van vriendelijkheid en zorg, en redt uiteindelijk haar gemeenschap van een verborgen gevaar.
summaryFrench: Ling Moore, une super-héroïne retraitée de 78 ans, redécouvre ses pouvoirs par l'acte de gentillesse et de soin, sauvant finalement sa communauté d'un danger caché.

story.text: Ling Moore starts her week with a routine visit to the local community center where she engages in her hobby of advising. Unbeknownst to her, a mysterious energy source begins affecting the town's electronics.
She senses something amiss when her old superhero instincts kick in as she helps a young couple navigate their financial troubles. The electronics in the area flicker strangely as she speaks.
Investigating the electronic disturbances, Ling stumbles upon a hidden device in the community center's basement. Her advising session is interrupted by a mild earthquake.
Ling uses her forgotten tech skills to dismantle the device, discovering it's a bomb set by a forgotten enemy from her past. She feels a rush of youthful vigor.
With the bomb disarmed, Ling informs the authorities and spends the day recounting her adventure to amazed townsfolk, inspiring others with her courage and sharp mind.
During a celebratory community gathering in her honor, Ling advices young heroes on the importance of vigilance and kindness, sharing her wisdom.
Reflecting on her week, Ling feels a profound sense of fulfillment. She realizes that, regardless of age, her hero’s journey continues as long as she chooses to engage with the world around her.

moral: You're never too old to make a difference; heroes come in all ages and forms.
